body:
The OpenMPI package lists version 4.0.5 as the preferred version. Initially, this only meant that version 4.1.0 would not be installed by default. By now, successor versions 4.0.6 and 4.1.1 are available.

It might now be possible to remove `preferred=True` tag, or to move it forward. If not, its reason should be documented.
title: OpenMPI: Update preferred version
